text:
[Verse]
Night falls shadows glow
Wishing on the sky's flow
Stars above dreams below
Where do your wishes go

[Verse 2]
City lights fade away
Whispers of the night play
Moonlight guides the astray
In dreams we all sway

[Chorus]
Dreams of stars near and far
Bright and bold just like a scar
Chase the night reach so high
Fly beyond touch the sky

[Verse 3]
Heartbeat like the moon’s tide
Feel the magic deep inside
Underneath the starry ride
In dreams we confide

[Bridge]
Close your eyes count to three
Worlds collide just believe
In the stars you will see
Every dream we conceive

[Chorus]
Dreams of stars near and far
Bright and bold just like a scar
Chase the night reach so high
Fly beyond touch the sky
title: Dreams of Stars
